00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Assigner;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Assigner - Assign homework sets to users.
00023 
00024 =cut
00025 
00026 use strict;
00027 use warnings;
00028 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00029 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00030 use WeBWorK::HTML::ScrollingRecordList qw/scrollingRecordList/;
00031 
00032 sub pre_header_initialize {
00033     my ($self) = @_;
00034     my $r = $self->r;
00035     my $db = $r->db;
00036     my $authz = $r->authz;
00037     my $ce = $r->ce;
00038     my $user = $r->param('user');
00039     
00040     # Permissions dealt with in the body
00041     return "" unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00042     return "" unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "assign_problem_sets");
00043 
00044     my @selected_users = $r->param("selected_users");
00045     my @selected_sets = $r->param("selected_sets");
00046     
00047     if (defined $r->param("assign") || defined $r->param("unassign")) {
00048         if  (@selected_users && @selected_sets) {
00049             my @results;  # This is not used?
00050             if(defined $r->param("assign")) {
00051                 $self->assignSetsToUsers(\@selected_sets, \@selected_users);
00052                 $self->addgoodmessage('All assignments were made successfully.');
00053             }
00054             if (defined $r->param("unassign")) {
00055                 if(defined $r->param('unassignFromAllSafety') and $r->param('unassignFromAllSafety')==1) {
00056                     $self->unassignSetsFromUsers(\@selected_sets, \@selected_users) if(defined $r->param("unassign"));
00057                     $self->addgoodmessage('All unassignments were made successfully.');
00058                 } else { # asked for unassign, but no safety radio toggle
00059                     $self->addbadmessage('Unassignments were not done.  You need to both click to "Allow unassign" and click on the Unassign button.');
00060                 }
00061             }
00062             
00063             if (@results) { # Can't get here?
00064                 $self->addbadmessage(
00065                     "The following error(s) occured while assigning:".
00066                     CGI::ul(CGI::li(\@results))
00067                 );
00068             }
00069         } else {
00070             $self->addbadmessage("You must select one or more users below.")
00071                 unless @selected_users;
00072             $self->addbadmessage("You must select one or more sets below.")
00073                 unless @selected_sets;
00074         }
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 sub body {
00079     my ($self) = @_;
00080     my $r = $self->r;
00081     my $db = $r->db;
00082     my $authz = $r->authz;
00083     my $ce = $r->ce;
00084     
00085     my $user = $r->param('user');
00086     
00087     # Check permissions
00088     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, "You are not authorized to access the Instructor tools.")
00089         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00090     
00091     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, "You are not authorized to assign homework sets.")
00092         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "assign_problem_sets");
00093 
00094     
00095     print CGI::p("Select one or more sets and one or more users below to assign/unassign"
00096         . " each selected set to/from all selected users.");
00097     
00098     # DBFIXME shouldn't have to get the user id list
00099     # DBFIXME mark's filtering should happen in a WHERE clause
00100     my @userIDs = $db->listUsers;
00101     my @Users = $db->getUsers(@userIDs);
00102 ## Mark's Edits for filtering
00103     my @myUsers;
00104 
00105     
00106     my (@viewable_sections, @viewable_recitations);
00107     
00108     if (defined @{$ce->{viewable_sections}->{$user}})
00109         {@viewable_sections = @{$ce->{viewable_sections}->{$user}};}
00110     if (defined @{$ce->{viewable_recitations}->{$user}})
00111         {@viewable_recitations = @{$ce->{viewable_recitations}->{$user}};}
00112     if (@viewable_sections or @viewable_recitations){
00113         foreach my $student (@Users){
00114             my $keep = 0;
00115             foreach my $sec (@viewable_sections){
00116                 if ($student->section() eq $sec){$keep = 1;}
00117             }
00118             foreach my $rec (@viewable_recitations){
00119                 if ($student->section() eq $rec){$keep = 1;}
00120             }
00121             if ($keep) {push @myUsers, $student;}
00122         }
00123         @Users = @myUsers;
00124     }
00125 ## End Mark's Edits
00126 
00127     
00128     # DBFIXME shouldn't have to get the set ID list
00129     my @globalSetIDs = $db->listGlobalSets;
00130     my @GlobalSets = $db->getGlobalSets(@globalSetIDs);
00131     
00132     my $scrolling_user_list = scrollingRecordList({
00133         name => "selected_users",
00134         request => $r,
00135         default_sort => "lnfn",
00136         default_format => "lnfn_uid",
00137         default_filters => ["all"],
00138         size => 20,
00139         multiple => 1,
00140     }, @Users);
00141     
00142     my $scrolling_set_list = scrollingRecordList({
00143         name => "selected_sets",
00144         request => $r,
00145         default_sort => "set_id",
00146         default_format => "set_id",
00147         default_filters => ["all"],
00148         size => 20,
00149         multiple => 1,
00150     }, @GlobalSets);
00151     
00152     print CGI::start_form({method=>"post", action=>$r->uri()});
00153     print $self->hidden_authen_fields();
00154     
00155     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00156         CGI::Tr(
00157             CGI::th("Users"),
00158             CGI::th("Sets"),
00159         ),
00160         CGI::Tr(
00161             CGI::td($scrolling_user_list),
00162             CGI::td($scrolling_set_list),
00163         ),
00164         CGI::Tr(
00165             CGI::td({colspan=>2, class=>"ButtonRow"},
00166                 CGI::submit(
00167                     -name => "assign",
00168                     -value => "Assign selected sets to selected users",
00169                     -style => "width: 45ex",
00170                 ),
00171             ),
00172         ),
00173         CGI::Tr(
00174             CGI::td({colspan=>2},
00175                 CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError', style=>'color:red'},
00176                     "Do not unassign students unless you know what you are doing.",
00177                     CGI::br(),
00178                     "There is NO undo for unassigning students. ",
00179                     CGI::br(),
00180                     CGI::submit(
00181                         -name => "unassign",
00182                         -value => "Unassign selected sets from selected users",
00183                         -style => "width: 45ex",
00184                     ),
00185                     CGI::radio_group(-name=>"unassignFromAllSafety", -values=>[0,1], -default=>0, -labels=>{0=>'Assignments only', 1=>'Allow unassign'}),
00186                 ),
00187             ),
00188         ),
00189     );
00190 
00191     
00192 
00193     print CGI::p("When you unassign a student's name, you destroy all
00194             of the data for that homework set for that student. You will then need to
00195             reassign the set(s) to these students and they will receive new versions of the problems.
00196             Make sure this is what you want to do before unassigning students."
00197     );
00198     
00199     print CGI::end_form();
00200     
00201     return "";
00202 }
